section.title: Create Project
section.para: Create the Java project called com.vogella.mat.first and the com.vogella.mat.first package. Create the following class.

section.title: Run project and create heap dump
section.para: In Eclipse add the -XX:+HeapDumpOnOutOfMemoryError to the runtime configuration.
Run the project. It crashes and writes an heap dump .

section.title: Use MAT to analyze the heap dump
section.para: Open the heap dump in MAT and get familiar with using the MAT tooling.
